mapper.sql: t.id id, t.yaid yaid, t.mbid mbid, t.yazl yazl, t.yabh yabh, t.yasxh yasxh, t.gxbbh gxbbh, t.yabbh yabbh, t.bmdj bmdj, t.yalxdm yalxdm, t.yamc yamc, t.dxid dxid, t.bwid bwid, t.yaztdm yaztdm, t.dxlxdm dxlxdm, t.sfkqy sfkqy, t.zzrid zzrid, t.zzrmc zzrmc, t.zzdwid zzdwid, t.zzdwmc zzdwmc, TO_CHAR(t.zzrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzrq, t.czyid czyid, t.czyxm czyxm, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, t.sfmya sfmya, t.jgid jgid, t.jgmc jgmc, t.dxmc dxmc, t.bwmc bwmc, t.sfwlsj sfwlsj, t.czjg czjg, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, t.jksjbb jksjbb, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, t.byzda byzda, t.byzdb byzdb, t.byzdc byzdc, t.byzdd byzdd, t.pkid pkid
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YAJBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 1

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YAJBXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YAJBXX(id,yaid,mbid,yazl,yabh,yasxh,gxbbh,yabbh,bmdj,yalxdm,yamc,dxid,bwid,yaztdm,dxlxdm,sfkqy,zzrid,zzrmc,zzdwid,zzdwmc,zzrq,czyid,czyxm,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,sfmya,jgid,jgmc,dxmc,bwmc,sfwlsj,czjg,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,jksjbb,tbjdh,tbsjc,byzda,byzdb,byzdc,byzdd,pkid) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yazl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gxbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bmdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yaztdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfkqy,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfmya,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfwlsj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{czjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jksjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{byzda,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{byzdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{byzdc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{byzdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YAJBXX t SET t.JLZT = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YAJBXX(id,yaid,mbid,yazl,yabh,yasxh,gxbbh,yabbh,bmdj,yalxdm,yamc,dxid,bwid,yaztdm,dxlxdm,sfkqy,zzrid,zzrmc,zzdwid,zzdwmc,zzrq,czyid,czyxm,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,sfmya,jgid,jgmc,dxmc,bwmc,sfwlsj,czjg,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,jksjbb,tbjdh,tbsjc,byzda,byzdb,byzdc,byzdd,pkid) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yaid,#{item.mbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mbid,#{item.yazl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} yazl,#{item.yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabh,#{item.yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yasxh,#{item.gxbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gxbbh,#{item.yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabbh,#{item.bmdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bmdj,#{item.yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yalxdm,#{item.yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yamc,#{item.dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxid,#{item.bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwid,#{item.yaztdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yaztdm,#{item.dxlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxlxdm,#{item.sfkqy,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sfkqy,#{item.zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrid,#{item.zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrmc,#{item.zzdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzdwid,#{item.zzdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzdwmc,#{item.zzrq,jdbcType=DATE} zzrq,#{item.czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyid,#{item.czyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyxm,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.sfmya,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sfmya,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgmc,#{item.dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxmc,#{item.bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwmc,#{item.sfwlsj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sfwlsj,#{item.czjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czjg,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.jksjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jksjbb,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.byzda,jdbcType=VARCHAR} byzda,#{item.byzdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} byzdb,#{item.byzdc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} byzdc,#{item.byzdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} byzdd,
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), yaid = VALUES(yaid), mbid = VALUES(mbid), yazl = VALUES(yazl), yabh = VALUES(yabh), yasxh = VALUES(yasxh), gxbbh = VALUES(gxbbh), yabbh = VALUES(yabbh), bmdj = VALUES(bmdj), yalxdm = VALUES(yalxdm), yamc = VALUES(yamc), dxid = VALUES(dxid), bwid = VALUES(bwid), yaztdm = VALUES(yaztdm), dxlxdm = VALUES(dxlxdm), sfkqy = VALUES(sfkqy), zzrid = VALUES(zzrid), zzrmc = VALUES(zzrmc), zzdwid = VALUES(zzdwid), zzdwmc = VALUES(zzdwmc), zzrq = VALUES(zzrq), czyid = VALUES(czyid), czyxm = VALUES(czyxm), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), sfmya = VALUES(sfmya), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jgmc = VALUES(jgmc), dxmc = VALUES(dxmc), bwmc = VALUES(bwmc), sfwlsj = VALUES(sfwlsj), czjg = VALUES(czjg), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), jksjbb = VALUES(jksjbb), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), byzda = VALUES(byzda), byzdb = VALUES(byzdb), byzdc = VALUES(byzdc), byzdd = VALUES(byzdd), pkid = VALUES(pkid)

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YAJBXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 1
